TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISessionIDManager

summary.span: 定义自定义会话状态标识符管理器必须实现的协定。

span.span: Defines the contract that a custom session-state identifier manager must implement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口标识必须实现以创建自定义管理器的会话标识符值的方法。The interface identifies the methods that you must implement to create a custom manager for session-identifier values. 接口实现创建并验证会话标识符值和管理从 HTTP 请求的 HTTP 响应中的会话标识符的存储以及会话标识符值的检索。An interface implementation creates and validates session-identifier values, and manages the storage of a session identifier in the HTTP response as well as the retrieval of a session-identifier value from the HTTP request. 启用使用自定义的会话 ID 管理器`sessionIDManagerType`的属性[sessionState 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)配置元素。You enable the custom session-ID manager using the `sessionIDManagerType` attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) configuration element. 如果你接口实现将支持无 cookie 会话标识符，将需要实现用于发送和检索 URL，如 ISAPI 筛选器中的会话标识符的解决方案。If your interface implementation will support cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter. 如果只想要提供自定义的会话标识符值，供 ASP.NET 会话状态，则可以创建继承的类类，并只重写和与自定义实现的方法。If you only want to supply custom session-identifier values to be used by ASP.NET session state, you can create a class that inherits the class and override only the and methods with your own custom implementation. 这使您可以提供你自己的会话标识符值，同时依赖于基类将值存储到的 HTTP 响应并从 HTTP 请求中检索值。This enables you to supply your own session-identifier values, while relying on the base class to store values to the HTTP response and retrieve values from the HTTP request. 有关重写的示例类并实现这些方法，请参见为提供的示例方法的类。For an example of overriding the class and implementing these methods, see the example provided for the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个类实现基于 cookie 的会话 ID 管理器。The following code example shows a class that implements a cookie-based session-ID manager. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

summary.span: 创建一个唯一的会话标识符。

span.span: Creates a unique session identifier.
A unique session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于生成唯一的会话标识符的对象将用于标识新会话。The method is used to generate a unique session identifier that the object will use to identify a new session. 返回的值必须是唯一的并且必须包含有效字符，可以存储在一个 HTTP 响应和请求。The value returned by must be unique and must contain valid characters that can be stored in an HTTP response and request. 如有可能返回的值在实现包含在 HTTP 响应或请求中无效的字符，则应使用方法中的会话标识符值进行编码您方法实现和方法进行解码的会话标识符值中你方法的实现。If it is possible that the value returned by your implementation contains characters that are not valid in an HTTP response or request, you should use the method to encode the session-identifier value in your method implementation and the method to decode the session-identifier value in your method implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现方法。The following code example implements the method. 该方法创建一个新要用作会话标识符。The method creates a new to be used as a session identifier. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#3)]

summary.span: 从当前 HTTP 请求的上下文中获取会话标识符。

span.span: Gets the session identifier from the context of the current HTTP request.

returns.span: 随 HTTP 请求一起发送的当前会话标识符。

span.span: The current session identifier sent with the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法期间和事件。The method is called by the during the and events. 如果不能从 HTTP 请求来检索有效会话标识符，则返回`null`。If you cannot retrieve a valid session identifier from the HTTP request, return `null`. 如果接收`null`从方法，它将调用方法以获取新的会话标识符的新会话。If the receives `null` from the method, it will call the method to get a new session identifier for a new session. 如有可能返回的值在实现包含在 HTTP 响应或请求中无效的字符，则应使用方法中的会话标识符值进行编码您方法实现和方法进行解码的会话标识符值中你方法的实现。If it is possible that the value returned by your implementation contains characters that are not valid in an HTTP response or request, you should use the method to encode the session-identifier value in your method implementation and the method to decode the session-identifier value in your method implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个部分实现方法。The following code example shows a partially implemented method. 如果自定义的会话 ID 管理器支持无 cookie 会话标识符，您需要实现用于发送和检索 URL，如 ISAPI 筛选器中的会话标识符的解决方案。If your custom session-ID manager supports cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool InitializeRequest (System.Web.HttpContext context, bool suppressAutoDetectRedirect, out bool supportSessionIDReissue);

Public Function InitializeRequest (context As HttpContext, suppressAutoDetectRedirect As Boolean, ByRef supportSessionIDReissue As Boolean) As Boolean
public: bool InitializeRequest(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context, bool suppressAutoDetectRedirect, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % supportSessionIDReissue);
abstract member InitializeRequest : System.Web.HttpContext * bool * -> bool

param.name: context
param.span: 包含有关当前请求的信息的 对象。

span.span: The object that contains information about the current request.

param.name: suppressAutoDetectRedirect
param.span: 如果会话标识符管理器必须重定向来确定 Cookie 支持，则为 ；否则为 ，以取消确定 Cookie 支持的自动重定向。

span.span: if the session-ID manager should redirect to determine cookie support; otherwise, to suppress automatic redirection to determine cookie support.

param.name: supportSessionIDReissue
param.span: 该方法返回时会包含一个布尔值，指示原始 ID 过期后 对象是否支持发出新的会话 ID。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a Boolean that indicates whether the object supports issuing new session IDs when the original ID is out of date.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.span: 当会话状态 ID 在 URL 上被编码，或者存在 URL 被共享或传送的可能性时，重复使用会话 ID 是合理的做法。

span.span: Session ID reuse is appropriate when the session-state ID is encoded on a URL and the potential exists for the URL to be shared or emailed.

param.span: 如果自定义会话状态实现按虚拟路径将 Cookie 分区，则同样应支持会话状态。

span.span: If a custom session-state implementation partitions cookies by virtual path, session state should also be supported.

summary.span: 针对每个请求执行 对象的初始化。

span.span: Performs per-request initialization of the object.

returns.span: 如果初始化执行了重定向，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to indicate that the initialization performed a redirect; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为处理的每个请求调用方法对象。The method is called for each request handled by the object. 使用方法来初始化每个请求的数据对象。Use the method to initialize per-request data for the object. 当`suppressAutoDetectRedirect`参数是`true`，则对象不应使用重定向来确定在浏览器是否支持 cookie。When the `suppressAutoDetectRedirect` parameter is `true`, the object should not use redirection to determine whether the browser supports cookies. `supportSessionIDReissue`应返回参数`false`如果 cookie 用于会话标识; 否则，返回`true`如果你实现支持重新颁发的会话 Id。The `supportSessionIDReissue` parameter should be returned `false` if cookies are used for session identification; otherwise, return `true` if your implementation supports re-issuing session IDs.

summary.span: 将新创建的会话标识符保存到 HTTP 响应。

span.span: Saves a newly created session identifier to the HTTP response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法期间对象事件。The method is called by the object during the event. 方法会将 URL （当使用无 cookie 会话状态） 中或在不过期的会话 cookie 中存储的会话标识符。The method stores the session identifier either in the URL (when cookieless session state is used) or in a non-expiring session cookie. 它是否可以从返回的值在实现包含在 HTTP 响应或请求中无效的字符，则应使用方法中的会话标识符值进行编码您方法实现和方法进行解码的会话标识符值中你方法的实现。If it is possible that the value returned from your implementation contains characters that are not valid in an HTTP response or request, you should use the method to encode the session-identifier value in your method implementation and the method to decode the session-identifier value in your method implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个部分实现方法。The following code example shows a partially implemented method. 如果自定义的会话 ID 管理器支持无 cookie 会话标识符，您需要实现用于发送和检索 URL，如 ISAPI 筛选器中的会话标识符的解决方案。If your custom session-ID manager supports cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter.
